Reviews.Title: “Howard Johnson Toronto Lakeshore Experience”
Reviews.Author: Phil S
Reviews.Content: stayed howard johnson hotel avenue truly enjoyed staff friendly comfortable clean breakfast adequate manager thorough gentleman hesitate recommend hotel stay moreover located convenient location easy catch tram queen king streets toronto im australia visit toronto definitely staying howard johnson lakeshore phil

Reviews.Title: “very small room, window cracked”
Reviews.Author: Kristina1124
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed 3 nights ago dont tell city buses park parking 3 blocks creepy locked garage breakfast restaurant door ok front desk people nice overall hotel experience sad faced street front window cracked walked downtown walk bridge lake investigated bit didnt venture immediate except walk car trolly town ok toronto definitely stay closer town original photo website isnt looked photoshopped wires attached real photo actually 2007 didnt review reviews read recent havent changed except name

Reviews.Title: “How does health and Safety allow this hotel to stay opened?”
Reviews.Author: Irishsakani
Reviews.Content: worst hotel experience life couldnt stay smell awful streets cleaner flys bathroom dont risk reviewers hard please bad five minutes matter city toronto backside cab driver downtown hotel laughed booked nicer downtown price arrived told upgraded 2 beds didnt nonsmoking king left booked smoking ok agreed gagging smell curtains dirty scummy window worse upgrade bathroom rotten pubic hairs floor shower curtain stained carpet patchy blood splatters wall paper lots stains spent entire stay 15 mins flies checked beds final decision base bed stains bedclothes stained gold duvets wet patches pubic hairs bed dark hairs blonde hairs 2 beds similar reception wrong didnt cleaned occupants arguing started told wasnt luxury hotel expecting clean bed norm hotels regardless rating told clean cleaner serviced morning look hairs beds swept dirty carpet wrong bed budget hotel couldnt afford quality bed linen towels expected clean extremely unhelpful argumentative didnt night occupied refund booked 3 nights wasnt option stay talk manager day wet stains bedclothes lifted saying send laundry eh anyway deciding couldnt stay bags reception alternative arrangements refused 7pm speak manager day guy prove hotel cleaned werent impressed bit couldnt else booked strangest rudest experience hotel north america india africa europe needless extra 10 night lovely 4 downtown howard johnston kept 1 nights cost refunded 2 nights manager extremely rude argumentative

Reviews.Title: “Just, not very good.”
Reviews.Author: brokenarm22
Reviews.Content: carpets wet shampoo smelled staff continental breakfast ok location near lake wasnt downtown try hotel toronto

Reviews.Title: “I would never recommend this hotel to anyone”

Reviews.Content: hotel smells stale smoke clean hair bathroom floor mold garbage refused shoes unclean staff unfriendly town shady chased outside hotel random guy safe expected barge middle night people walking video cameras lights shooting film awful id sleep car

Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 2 nights located street sleeping directly streets noise streetcars loud earplugs hard time sleeping forget putting fan air conditionning reduce noiseit worst sounded airplane decided stay paid taught paid expect 55 night toronto wasnt noise wouldnt mind staying location wasnt bad price toronto double bed okthe tiny ok cleanliness carpet clean bathroom clean elevator parking 2 blocks hotel located 20 minutes downtown toronto streetcars 501 504 breakfast ok waffles bagels toasts cereals jams cream cheese juices coffee apples ive read comments saying hotel located ghetto rich thats

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE PLACE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: greeneye50
Reviews.Content: 14th march 2011 hotel didnt actually look shabby outside neighborhood little anyways receptionist unfriendly actually paid attention pay 50 cad deposit located 3rd floor elevator carry 3 suitcases help offered whatsoever yelled insulted drunk stairs reception desk interfering couldnt believe eyes carpet stairs towards disgusting weve seen topped stains size spaghetti bowl mold stains bathroom curtain pillow sheets wall announced double single downstairs complain manager wasnt morning tried breakfast waffle maker skipped unfortunately manager wasnt left found stuff left hasnt cleaned morning called manger morning rude unreasonable uneducated person wouldnt finish sentence referred policy refund 5 times conversation hotel scam highly recommend dollar day

Reviews.Content: staff hotel inside wont stay reason offer 30 3 days stay atractive people dont horrible arrive cancel money gift money recommend hotel appear telling diferent saying instructed

Reviews.Content: recently stayed weekend horrible park car 10 mins check unload luggage park 2 blocks underground garage nice multiple occasions homeless people money breakfast true definition continental consists cereal toast else arent restaurants nearby dont look picked hotel cheaper expensive downtown park downtown pay taxi public transportation construction near hotel change buses half route waiting hour bus times idea pay extra money stay downtown

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING PRICE,AMAZING PEOPLE,AMAZING ROOMS!”

Reviews.Content: monday boyfriend stayed night friendly smiling outside hotel doesnt look nice inside pleasant beautiful 201 kings bedroom payed deposit 50 quiet safe clean free breakfast bread toast love hotel boyfriend miss definitely coming recommend
